chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
z0: R
s: SF_seq
pr: SF_sorted Rle s

Goal:
adapted_couple (SF_fun s z0) (head 0 (SF_lx s)) (last 0 (SF_lx s)) (seq2Rlist (SF_lx s)) (seq2Rlist (SF_ly s))

Premises:
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
SF_ly = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => unzip2 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
SF_fun = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) (y0 : T) (x : R) => SF_fun_aux (SF_h s, y0) (SF_t s) y0 x : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> T -> R -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ R_scope]
adapted_couple = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => ordered_Rlist l /\ pos_Rl l 0 = Rmin a b /\ pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = Rmax a b /\ Rlength l = S (Rlength lf) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq f (open_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (pos_Rl lf i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
Rle = fun r1 r2 : R => r1 < r2 \/ r1 = r2 : R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
seq2Rlist = fix seq2Rlist (s : seq R) : Rlist := match s with | [::] => nil | h :: t => cons h (seq2Rlist t) end : seq R -> Rlist Argument scope is [seq_scope]
SF_fun_incr : forall (s0 : SF_seq) (y0 : ?T) (x : R) (Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s0)) (Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s0) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s0)), SF_fun s0 y0 x = match sorted_dec (SF_lx s0) 0 x Hs Hx with | inleft H => nth y0 (SF_ly s0) (proj1_sig H) | inright _ => nth y0 (SF_ly s0) (SF_size s0 - 1) end where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
SF_last_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
SF_last_lx : forall (x0 : ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), fst (SF_last x0 s0) = last 0 (SF_lx s0) where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
SF_lx_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_cat x y) = SF_lx x ++ behead (SF_lx y) where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
Riemann_sum_zero : forall (f : R -> ?V) (ptd : SF_seq), SF_sorted Rle ptd -> SF_h ptd = last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> Riemann_sum f ptd = zero where ?V : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
Riemann_sum_Chasles_0 : forall (f : R -> ?V) (M x : R) (ptd : SF_seq) (eps : posreal), (forall x0 : R, SF_h ptd <= x0 <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f x0) < M) -> SF_h ptd <= x <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> pointed_subdiv ptd -> seq_step (SF_lx ptd) < eps -> norm (minus (plus (Riemann_sum f (SF_cut_down ptd x)) (Riemann_sum f (SF_cut_up ptd x))) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) < 2 * eps * M where ?V : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
norm_ge_0 : forall x : ?V, 0 <= norm x where ?K : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- AbsRing] ?V : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- NormedModule ?K]
last_unzip1 : forall (x0 : ?S) (y0 : ?T) (s0 : seq (?S * ?T)), last x0 (unzip1 s0) = fst (last (x0, y0) s0) where ?S : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type] ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
SF_fun_map : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (s0 : SF_seq) (y0 : ?T) (x : R), SF_fun (SF_map f s0) (f y0) x = f (SF_fun s0 y0 x) where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type] ?T0 : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
scal_zero_l : forall u : ?V, scal zero u = zero where ?K : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Ring] ?V : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- ModuleSpace ?K]
norm_opp : forall x : ?V, norm (opp x) = norm x where ?K : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- AbsRing] ?V : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- NormedModule ?K]
SF_map_sort : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (s0 : SF_seq) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop), SF_sorted Ord s0 -> SF_sorted Ord (SF_map f s0) where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type] ?T0 : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
norm_triangle : forall x y : ?V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y where ?K : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- AbsRing] ?V : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_scal : forall (l : ?K) (x : ?V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x where ?K : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- AbsRing] ?V : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- NormedModule ?K]
plus_zero_r : forall x : ?G, plus x zero = x where ?G : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- AbelianGroup]
ptd_sort' : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> sorted Rle (SF_ly ptd)
SF_size_cons : forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_cons h s0) = S (SF_size s0) where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
SF_cons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), P (SF_cons h s0)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
SF_seq_f1 = fun (T : Type) (f1 : R -> T) (P : seq R) => {| SF_h := head 0 P; SF_t := pairmap (fun x y : R => (y, f1 x)) (head 0 P) (behead P) |} : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> seq R -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
SF_lx_cons : forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_cons h s0) = fst h :: SF_lx s0 where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), P s0 -> P (SF_cons h s0)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
SF_seq_f2 = fun (T : Type) (f2 : R -> R -> T) (P : seq R) => {| SF_h := head 0 P; SF_t := pairmap (fun x y : R => (y, f2 x y)) (head 0 P) (behead P) |} : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> T) -> seq R -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
SF_cut_down = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_down ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
SF_cut_up = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_up ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
Rmult_lt_0_compat : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 < r1 -> 0 < r2 -> 0 < r1 * r2
Rdiv_le_0_compat : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 < r2 -> 0 <= r1 / r2
nth0 : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s 0 = head x0 s
Rlt_0_2 = Rlt_trans 0 (0 + 1) 2 (Rlt_n_Sn 0) (eq_ind_r (fun r : R => r < 2) (Rplus_lt_compat_l R1 0 R1 (let H : 0 + 1 = R1 := Rplus_0_l R1 in eq_ind (0 + 1) (fun r : R => 0 < r) (Rlt_n_Sn 0) R1 H)) (Rplus_comm 0 1)) : 0 < 2
Riemann_sum_cons : forall (f : R -> ?V) (h0 : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum f (SF_cons h0 ptd) = plus (scal (SF_h ptd - fst h0) (f (snd h0))) (Riemann_sum f ptd) where ?V : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
interval_finite_subdiv : forall (a b : R) (eps : posreal), a <= b -> {l : seq R | head 0 l = a /\ last 0 l = b /\ (forall i : nat, (S i < size l)%nat -> nth 0 l i < nth 0 l (S i) <= nth 0 l i + eps)}
sorted_nth : forall (Ord : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s0 : seq ?T), sorted Ord s0 < -> (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (size s0))%nat -> forall x0 : ?T, Ord (nth x0 s0 i) (nth x0 s0 (S i))) where ?T : [z0 : R s : SF_seq pr : SF_sorted Rle s |- Type]
ptd_sort : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> SF_sorted Rle ptd
cond_pos : forall p : posreal, 0 < p
Rabs_pos : forall x : R, 0 <= Rabs x
Rmult_le_0_lt_compat : forall r1 r2 r3 r4 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 <= r3 -> r1 < r2 -> r3 < r4 -> r1 * r3 < r2 * r4
nfloor : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> nat
Rminus_eq_0 : forall r : R, r - r = 0
Rabs_pos_eq : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> Rabs x = x
Rminus_lt_0 : forall a b : R, a < b < -> 0 < b - a

original: unfold adapted_couple. unfold seq2Rlist. rewrite SF_lx. rewrite SF_ly. unfold SF_fun. split. - apply sorted_cons_inv with (h := head 0 (SF_h s)) (s := unzip1 (SF_t s)). + apply pr. + apply sorted_nth. * apply pr. * intros i Hi. simpl. destruct i. { simpl. apply SF_sorted_hd in pr. rewrite pr. apply Rle_refl. } { specialize (SF_sorted_tl pr) as Hs_tl. apply Hs_tl. lia. } - split. + simpl. apply Rmin_left. * apply SF_sorted_hd in pr. rewrite pr. apply Rle_refl. + split. * simpl. apply Rmax_right. { apply SF_sorted_hd in pr. rewrite pr. apply Rle_refl. } { apply SF_sorted_last in pr. rewrite pr. apply Rle_refl. } * split. { simpl. apply eq_refl. } { intros i Hi. simpl. destruct i. + simpl. apply sorted_nth with (s0 := unzip1 (SF_t s)). { apply pr. } { simpl. apply pr. } + simpl. apply sorted_nth with (s0 := unzip2 (SF_t s)). { apply pr. } { apply Hi. } + apply pr.
